contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Apr''' or '''APR''' may refer to: == In the context of organizations == *[[Agrarian Party of Russia]], a left-wing political party in Russia *[[Alabama Public Radio]] *[[American Public Radio]], now Public Radio International *[[Asia-Pacific Scout Region (World Organization of the Scout Movement)]] *[[Armée Patriotique Rwandaise FC]], Rwandan association football club == In technology == *[[ARP Poison Routing]], spoofing of the address resolution protocol (ARP) *[[Acoustic paramagnetic resonance]], a resonant absorption effect used in magnetic resonance spectroscopy *[[Acute phase reaction]], a reaction due to the presence of inflammatory allergens *[[Apache Portable Runtime]], a library for the Apache web server *[[Automatic performance reserve]], an aircraft system that increases power on remaining engines when one fails *[[Brügger & Thomet APR]] - the Advanced Precision Rifle, a Swiss sniper rifle *Advanced port replicator — a [[Docking station|docking device]]. == In other uses == *[[Annual percentage rate]], the interest rate computed for an entire year **The term includes the ''[[nominal APR]]'' and the ''[[effective APR]]'' *[[Abdominoperineal resection]] *[[April]], the fourth month of the Gregorian calendar *[[Academic Progress Rate]], an NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) guideline *[[Accreditation in Public Relations]] *[[Adleman–Pomerance–Rumely primality test]] to check whether a given number is prime *[[African Peer Review Mechanism]], an African Union self-monitoring mechanism *[[Alberta Prairie Railway Excursions]] *''[[Alternative Press Review]]'', a left-wing American political magazine *[[Andy Petree Racing]], stock car auto racing *[[Appian Publications & Recordings]] *[[The Chief Scouts' Advance Party Report]], a review of Scouting, with international implications, that took place in the UK in 1966 *[[Apple Premium Reseller]], stores (ratified by Apple) specializing in the sales of Apple Macintosh products. *[[acute phase reactant]] {{disambig}}
